title: HVAC Mechanic NEW!
full_description: Talent Corps. is hiring for HVAC mechanics for a job in Downtown Austin!Must have exp. working with Commercial refrigeration lines, & experience working on chiller pipes and HVAC Systems must also have experience in soldering cooper.The contractor will provide the tanks and torches, and a Soldering test will be given prior to starting work.This is a Monday-Friday shift, with occasional Saturdays
